quote_last: , and my parents and I were standing, stunned and half-awake, in the parking lot of a Howard Johnson’s in Iowa.
title: Soon I Will Be Invincible
author: Austin Grossman

quote_last: it was really only five minutes past, and at five minutes past I don’t suppose Colonel Protheroe had even arrived at the house.
title: The murder at the Vicarage
author: Agatha Christie
